A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is mockery and a parody of Star Wars and a spit in the face to true Star Wars fans.  I left the theater angry at what I had seen.  I will not be back to see it again and I wont buy it on Blu-Ray or streaming.  This was like Blazing Saddles Star Wars\, or Spaceballs or Monty Python.  Sad part is that this had the potential to be best Star Wars movie after \"The Force Awakens\" set everything up so respectfully....this movie is a total blind-side and the most incoherent movie I have ever seen.
